articles.description: Referee Halil Umut Meler is knocked to the ground by a football club president following a Turkish Super Lig game.
articles.title: Referee punched by club president after Turkish top-flight game

articles.description: Andriy Shevchenko had left Dynamo Kyiv four years earlier but, after lifting the Champions League trophy with AC Milan, he had a duty to return.
articles.title: A gift beyond the grave - Shevchenko's vow and victory

articles.description: Manchester United midfielder Scott McTominay says it has been "toxic at times" under former managers at Old Trafford but the players are "firmly behind" Erik ten Hag.
articles.title: 'Past was toxic at times but we're behind Ten Hag'

articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo scores his 50th goal in 2023 as Al-Nassr beat rivals Al-Shabab 5-2 to reach the semi-finals of the Saudi King Cup.
articles.title: Ronaldo scores his 50th goal in 2023

articles.description: World-record pole vaulter Armand Duplantis is named one of six World Athletes of the Year for 2023.
articles.title: Duplantis & Kipyegon among six Athletes of the Year

articles.description: Jofra Archer plays in Barbados without the knowledge of England management, despite still recovering from an elbow injury.
articles.title: Archer plays in Barbados without Key's knowledge

articles.description: The latest batch of replica Mary Earps England goalkeeper shirts sell out within five minutes in the England online store.
articles.title: Earps England shirts sell out in five minutes

articles.description: The Buffalo Bills edge out the Kansas City Chiefs while the San Francisco 49ers win a fifth in a row and Dallas beat Philadelphia.
articles.title: Chiefs furious with loss to Bills as 49ers roll on

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Chelsea's 2023 statistics after a horror year for the Blues in the Premier League.
articles.title: How Chelsea stats show it's been an awful year

articles.description: Rishabh Pant is set to make his return to cricket in the 2024 Indian Premier League after being seriously hurt in a car crash last December.
articles.title: Pant set for return to cricket in IPL after crash
